blogPost.excerpt: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
blogPost.body: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
blogPost.title: HackerMemo -  The coolest memo app for sci-fi lovers
blogPost.author: YuKiO | 個人開発&Flutter

localize.description: 黑客备忘录是一款追求 "酷 "的简单备忘录应用。设计以《黑客帝国》、《007》等科幻、谍战电影的形象为基础。
localize.tagline: 最酷的备忘录应用，适合科幻爱好者使用。

localize.description: 黑客備忘錄是一款追求 "酷 "的簡單備忘錄應用。設計以《黑客帝國》、《007》等科幻、諜戰電影的形象爲基礎。
localize.tagline: 最酷的備忘錄應用，適合科幻愛好者使用。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US have declined 39 days in a row, down 56% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y

localize.full_text: 科维德-19在美国的住院率已连续39天下降，比1月6日的峰值下降了56%。🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y。
科維德-19在美國的住院率已連續39天下降，比1月6日的峯值下降了56%。🙏 https://t.co/hGWdE9F87y。

next.title: The US has now vaccinated over 60% of people aged 75 and above and almost half of those aged 65-74. https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p

localize.full_text: 目前，美国已经有超过60%的75岁及以上的老人接种了疫苗，65-74岁的老人几乎有一半接种了疫苗。https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p。
目前，美國已經有超過60%的75歲及以上的老人接種了疫苗，65-74歲的老人幾乎有一半接種了疫苗。https://t.co/TdPH5Ggp6p。
